all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Nevertheless, in your temporal things you shall be equal, and this not grudgingly, otherwise the abundance of the manifestations of the Spirit shall be withheld.
Doctrine and Covenants 70:14
Quote of the Day
"As Jesus Christ becomes the focus of our lives, what we desire, and how we desire it, is forever altered. Conversion changes everything!"
Sister Amy A. Wright | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
